title: Delicious Dip
directions: In a mixing bowl, combine the cream cheese and sour cream. Mix until smooth. Spread in a 9x13 inch pan.

Sprinkle the pan's contents with garlic salt. Cover the mixture with a thin layer of picante sauce. Add another layer of tomatoes, onions and olives. Top with a layer of cheddar cheese. Chill for 30 minutes. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) container sour cream, room temperature
Â½ cup sliced black olives, drained
